verses.verse: If there <S%H6965>arise<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> you a <S%H5030>prophet<s%>, or a <S%H2492>dreamer<s%> of <S%H2472>dreams<s%>, and <S%H5414>giveth<s%> thee a <S%H226>sign<s%> or a <S%H4159>wonder<s%>,

And the <S%H226>sign<s%> or the <S%H4159>wonder<s%> come to <S%H935>pass<s%>, whereof he <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto thee, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Let us <S%H3212>go<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%>, which thou hast not <S%H3045>known<s%>, and let us <S%H5647>serve<s%> them;

Thou shalt not <S%H8085>hearken<s%> unto the <S%H1697>words<s%> of that <S%H5030>prophet<s%>, or that <S%H2492>dreamer<s%> of <S%H2472>dreams<s%>: for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5254>proveth<s%> you, to <S%H3045>know<s%> whether <S%H3426>ye<s%> <S%H157>love<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> with all your <S%H3824>heart<s%> and with all your <S%H5315>soul<s%>.

Ye shall <S%H3212>walk<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, and <S%H3372>fear<s%> him, and <S%H8104>keep<s%> his <S%H4687>commandments<s%>, and <S%H8085>obey<s%> his <S%H6963>voice<s%>, and ye shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> him, and <S%H1692>cleave<s%> unto him.

And that <S%H5030>prophet<s%>, or that <S%H2492>dreamer<s%> of <S%H2472>dreams<s%>, shall be put to <S%H4191>death<s%>; because he hath <S%H1696>spoken<s%> to <S%H5627>turn<s%> you away from the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, which brought you <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and <S%H6299>redeemed<s%> you out of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H5650>bondage<s%>, to <S%H5080>thrust<s%> thee out of the <S%H1870>way<s%> which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> thee to walk <S%H3212>in<s%>. So shalt thou <S%H1197>put<s%> the <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1197>away<s%> from the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of thee.

¶ If thy <S%H251>brother<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of thy <S%H517>mother<s%>, or thy <S%H1121>son<s%>, or thy <S%H1323>daughter<s%>, or the <S%H802>wife<s%> of thy <S%H2436>bosom<s%>, or thy <S%H7453>friend<s%>, which is as thine own <S%H5315>soul<s%>, <S%H5496>entice<s%> thee <S%H5643>secretly<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Let us <S%H3212>go<s%> and <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%>, which thou hast not <S%H3045>known<s%>, thou, nor thy <S%H1>fathers<s%>;

Namely, of the <S%H430>gods<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> which are round <S%H5439>about<s%> you, <S%H7138>nigh<s%> unto thee, or far <S%H7350>off<s%> from thee, from the one <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> even unto the other <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>;

Thou shalt not <S%H14>consent<s%> unto him, nor <S%H8085>hearken<s%> unto him; neither shall thine <S%H5869>eye<s%> <S%H2347>pity<s%> him, neither shalt thou <S%H2550>spare<s%>, neither shalt thou <S%H3680>conceal<s%> him:

But thou shalt <S%H2026>surely<s%> <S%H2026>kill<s%> him; thine <S%H3027>hand<s%> shall be <S%H7223>first<s%> upon him to put him to <S%H4191>death<s%>, and <S%H314>afterwards<s%> the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of all the <S%H5971>people<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H5619>stone<s%> him with <S%H68>stones<s%>, that he <S%H4191>die<s%>; because he hath <S%H1245>sought<s%> to thrust thee <S%H5080>away<s%> from the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>, which brought thee <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, from the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H5650>bondage<s%>.

And all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H8085>hear<s%>, and <S%H3372>fear<s%>, and shall <S%H6213>do<s%> no <S%H3254>more<s%> <S%H1697>any<s%> such <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> as this is <S%H7130>among<s%> you.

¶ If thou shalt <S%H8085>hear<s%> say in <S%H259>one<s%> of thy <S%H5892>cities<s%>, which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H5414>given<s%> thee to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> there, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Certain <S%H582>men<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1100>Belial<s%>, are gone <S%H3318>out<s%> from <S%H7130>among<s%> you, and have <S%H5080>withdrawn<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of their <S%H5892>city<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Let us <S%H3212>go<s%> and <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%>, which ye have not <S%H3045>known<s%>;

Then shalt thou <S%H1875>inquire<s%>, and make <S%H2713>search<s%>, and <S%H7592>ask<s%> <S%H3190>diligently<s%>; and, behold, if it be <S%H571>truth<s%>, and the <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H3559>certain<s%>, that <S%H2063>such<s%> <S%H8441>abomination<s%> is <S%H6213>wrought<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> you;

Thou shalt <S%H5221>surely<s%> <S%H5221>smite<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of that <S%H5892>city<s%> with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, destroying it <S%H2763>utterly<s%>, and all that is therein, and the <S%H929>cattle<s%> thereof, with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H6908>gather<s%> all the <S%H7998>spoil<s%> of it into the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H7339>street<s%> thereof, and shalt <S%H8313>burn<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%>, and all the <S%H7998>spoil<s%> thereof every <S%H3632>whit<s%>, for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>: and it shall be an <S%H8510>heap<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>; it shall not be built <S%H1129>again<s%>.

And there shall <S%H1692>cleave<s%> <S%H3972>nought<s%> of the cursed <S%H2764>thing<s%> to thine <S%H3027>hand<s%>: that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> may <S%H7725>turn<s%> from the <S%H2740>fierceness<s%> of his <S%H639>anger<s%>, and <S%H5414>shew<s%> thee <S%H7356>mercy<s%>, and have <S%H7355>compassion<s%> upon thee, and <S%H7235>multiply<s%> thee, as he hath <S%H7650>sworn<s%> unto thy <S%H1>fathers<s%>;

When thou shalt <S%H8085>hearken<s%> to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>, to <S%H8104>keep<s%> all his <S%H4687>commandments<s%> which I <S%H6680>command<s%> thee this <S%H3117>day<s%>, to <S%H6213>do<s%> that which is <S%H3477>right<s%> in the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>.
